question: 傲慢
sourceMnemonic: If you <kanji>ridicule</kanji> other people because you're so <kanji>proud</kanji> of yourself that everyone seems like crap in comparison, you've got too much <vocabulary>pride</vocabulary>. You should also work on toning down your <vocabulary>arrogance</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>haughtiness</vocabulary>, because people won't like you.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
